text:
TicketCity | Full Stack Developer and Developer Lead | Austin, TX | Onsite https://www.ticketcity.com/

We are an eCommerce marketplace for live events (sports, concerts, theater).

If you get sh*t done and love working on a close-knit dev team, we want you!

Our stack: Javascript, jQuery, React, MS-SQL, MongoDB, ElasticSearch, Node.js, .NET, Objective-C

https://www.ticketcity.com/careers-at-ticketcity.html

Feel free to email me (Caitlin) at csullivan@ticketcity.com to learn more about the role or life at as a TicketCitizen!
